block-att.description: Cancel attacks for next turn (all animal attacks)
block-att.name: Block all attacks for 1 turn

draw-2.ability: Draw 2 cards from the main deck

2-anim-gy.description: Return 2 animals to deck from animal graveyard
2-anim-gy.name: Return 2 dead animals to deck

block-pow.ability: Block using power cards for 1 turn
block-pow.description: Block opponent from using power cards

double-king-ap.description: Double king ability in its env
double-king-ap.name: Double king ability in its env

rev-any-anim-1hp.description: Sacrifice 1 hp to revive any animal, can attack

steal-anim-3hp.description: Sacrifice 3 hp to switch side of an opponent animal
